name: Craft chest
goal: Craft a chest from planks using a crafting table
notes: Chests store 27 stacks of items. Two chests placed adjacent become a large chest (54 slots). Any plank type works (can mix types). Chests need at least 1 block of air above them to open. Chests cannot be opened if a solid block or ocelot/cat is sitting on top. Requires a crafting table.

steps.title: Obtain planks
steps.details: You need 8 planks of any type. Craft from logs if needed (2 logs = 8 planks). Any wood type works.
checks: Have at least 8 planks in inventory

steps.title: Craft the chest
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Place 8 planks in all slots except the center (ring shape). Recipe: { "recipe": "chest", "count": 1 }.
